Member when international motorsport (#F1, #VASC) used to be on free to air tv in NZ? https://t.co/YxrWRnwiZ2
And then there is the fact that #VASC is only available here on (rip-off) pay tv. Sooooo many others are available free to watch.
Honestly, #VASC doesn't really hold my interest anymore. Too many others offering better racing, competitive fields and awesome cars.
So with GRM going back to Holden in #VASC, I am wondering how long Nissan will bother & wondering if any manufacturers are looking to join?
